Welcome %1$s! Karuna Relief Karuna Relief Login Compassionate Volunteers are working together efficiently to bring food/relief to the distressed in PUNE City and surrounding villages. Let\'s Get Started IS_FIRST_TIME_INSTALLATION Logout
About us Pragati Foundation Many landless, migrant labourers and their families in and around Pune, unemployed people, the elderly and sick have been hit hard by the lockdown caused by COVID Health Crisis. Pragati Foundation, along with a Network of other NGOs and Volunteers is currently focusing on distributing relief FOOD KITS to distressed families. Just Rs. 500 could help feed a family of 4 for around 10 days.
Please Donate to help supply food kits to the urban and rural poor around Pune and help them get through the COVID Crisis Donation from India Account Name Pragati Foundation Bank Name ICICI Bank, \nAundh Branch Account Number 007301023669 IFSC ICIC0000073
For Overseas Contribution State Bank of India, \nAundh Branch, \nPune, Maharashtra, \nIndia 10146130326 SBIN0008784 Swift Code SBIN INBB \n218(DG Pune) Contact Details Ranjan Sah 9226787919 Mohan Kandekar 7798072322 Deepak Ghatwilkar 9130784702 Your kind donation will be exempted from Tax under section 80G of the IT Act. We will provide you with relevant references and receipts. Karuna app is designed to help distribute the FOOD KITS to the people in need.
